sentences.sCn: 定期检查身体是明智的。

sentences.sContent: It is advisable to write a career objective at the start of your resume.
sentences.sCn: 简历开头最好写上职业目标。

sentences.sContent: ...it is advisable for the social media and publicity department to vigorously inform the public of the importance of invention...
...it is advisable for people to open their mind and treat others with sincerity and warmth...
...It is always advisable for businesses to look beyond the price tag and look for a business only provider that can offer more reliability...

remMethod.val: advis(e)(建议， 劝告) + able(能…的) → 能够听取别人的劝告是明智的 → 可取的

trans.tranOther: something that is advisable should be done in order to avoid problems or risks
